oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Names of Animals, mainly identified at the South African Museum. Given by /han=kasso (L VIII.-2. 6141-6145, 9. 6770-6775, 21. 7817, 7819-7821, 7842 and 7843, 7843, 7846, 31. 8790 rev. and 8791). A list list of |xam names of animals given by |han=kass'o at the South African Museum as well as some details about them. 1) p.6770: 'Museum, May 1, 1878'; p.6775: 'Mowbray 1 May /78', 2) This story is found in Book VIII-9.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences given by |han=kass'o at the South African Museum
